ygData.subject: Just a reminder...
ygData.msgSnippet: Do not charm things that are being attacked by the high level Qeynos guards. ... hits YOU for 296! ... hits YOU for 356! wtf? that guard is hitting me? ...
ygData.messageBody:
Do not charm things that are being attacked by the high level Qeynos guards.

... hits YOU for 296!
... hits YOU for 356!
wtf? that guard is hitting me?
... hits YOU for 328!
... hits YOU for 356!
LOADING, PLEASE WAIT...

/w all cleric 48 50
/tell auggie Hi! :) Are you busy right now?

So there I was trying to do a Shining Star of Light quest (dont ask). And
ran into a friend who had started a new monk so I am trying to help him get
level 3. I see Nixx DarkPaw run by and think, hmm... I can beat him to a
sliver and use Sirens to wipe the damage list. But apparently Nixx agro'd
the Qeynos guard and I somehow managed to stick a charm on him before he
died. And only moments later, I was dead too! Hehe, crazy bards never
learn.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of 44 songs
<The Pantheon>
somewhere on Innoruuk...

p.s. If you find Lempich (sp?) the guy usually on the roof of his barn along
the river in West Karana, sitting inside his barn, that may be a clue that
he is too sick to be cured. Ie, you give him the potion and he attacks you!
Other theory is that at night he is a 'werewolf' because he has been bitten.
And that's what happened to me - he attacked. Now, I could have easily
zoned him but instead I killed him to see if maybe he would drop that 'rusty
sycthe' needed for the quest but alas only some thing for the necro or sk
quest? Some other class kills him for that item.
